title: Model
description: Schema for the model.json file that defines the top-level model information. This file must exist at the root of your model directory. If validation fails, check that 'name' is present and is a non-empty string.

name.description: The name of the model. This should be a human-readable identifier for the entire model (e.g., 'Order Management System'). Must be non-empty. If validation fails: ensure the value is a string with at least one character, not null or an empty string.

details.description: Optional detailed description of the model. Use this to provide context about what the model represents, its scope, and any important assumptions. Can be multiple sentences or paragraphs.
